clues.text: (From baseball): To meet a colleague to discuss progress
Collaboration among employees "across" different domains of expertise
Two-word phrase for submerging (or drowning?) in reports to perform a thorough investigation
A "c"ompany's fundamental strength, to distinguish it from "c"ompetitors
Holy phrase for an epiphany about the reality that you have been avoiding. For example, Boris Johnson after contracting COVID-19
EKG is short for this, which measures activity of the heart
Properly dispose of used needles, etc. in bins marked with this symbol
This clothing gets its name from surgeons having to sterilize themselves before surgery
Technical name for stitches used to hold body tissues together after surgery
Doctors may order troponin tests for stroke patients to study contractions in these types of muscles
Anton Zaslavski is the full name of this "Clarity" artist
Youtube suggested his "Sandstorm" for all music queries as its 2015 April Fool's joke
This artist of "This Is What You Came For" (with Rihanna) and "Summer" hails from Scotland
Thanks to this 2014 hit, Kygo "flared on" Spotify, becoming first to 1 billion streams
Fall into a trance with this Dutch DJ's 2001 track "Suburban Train"
Researchers in Europe use this body part of the Vole for dating. Voles have evolved different enamel patterns over time
The Lambda-CDM (cold dark matter) model is the standard model of this event, dating back 13.8 billion years
This noble gas' 39 and 40 isotopes are used for dating igneous minerals
Denarius is a Roman type of this object. Archeologists take advantage of dates and/or faces engraved on it for study
Cosmic rays interact with atmospheric nitrogen to form this radioactive isotope, which living beings absorb but dead beings do not
Some bakeries in this "southern" city in Taiwan sell engagement cakes, for the bride to distribute to her family
Participants were expected to propose after just ten days of "blind" dating on this Netflix show
Romans believed that the fourth finger led to here, so they named that connection "vena amoris"
The other word for engagement (noun) that derives from "truth"
Prince Charles proposed to Kate Middleton with a beautiful ring, once worn by his mother Princess Diana, containing this gem
British husband of Cayetana Hutcheson. She probably doesn't need to cook when he's free
From 2000 to 2005, this Friends star was married to Brad Pitt
Mr. & Mrs. Smith established Brad Pitt's relationship with this person, his second wife. They also ended in a divorce

As of August 2019, the newest wife of Dwayne Johnson

double.name: SHAKESPEAREAN SPEAK
double.comment: (Fill in the word that Shakespeare coined.)

clues.text: A Midsummer Night's Dream: And make his (_______) roll with wonted sight
The Merchant of Venice: Though Nestor swear the jest be (_____able)
Titus Andronicus: Scatter'd by winds and high tempestuous (____s)
As You Like It: Take that, and He that doth the ravens feed, Yea providently (c_t__s) for the sparrow
King Henry VI: Comest though with deep (pre_______ed) lines, with written pamphlets studiously devised
Number of electrons for a chemical bond, or a drape over a windowframe
This Japanese company is famous for its Washlet, a toilet seat with bidet features
This type of feather, below the tough exterior feathers of birds, are used for comforters
Brand of the "original slow cooker", which became popular in the 1970s since women could cook dinner in the morning
"T"his is either used to elevate pots in an open fire, or placed between a serving dish and the dining table to protect the table
He died poor, but having a magnetic flux unit and company named after him vaulted him back to popularity
In 1931, he helped set up Vatican Radio for Pope Pius XI
One of Maxwell's equations, his law describes how a magnetic field can induce an electric field
His name is one of 72 inscribed on the Eiffel Tower, for studying how currents affect magnetism in two parallel conductors
A complicated circuit can be replaced by his "equivalent" simpler circuit of a voltage source and resistor in series
Three strikes in a row in bowling
NBC's newest streaming service
A mammal not native to India but an eponymous brand now belongs to India's Tata Motors
Don't borrow money from these exploitative lenders, who charge extremely high interest rates
Verb named after this animal meaning "to turn upside down", because an upside down boat looks like it
Estadio Azteca in this capital is a formidable venue for visiting soccer teams
Asia's highest capital is in this country that pioneered "Gross National Happiness"
One of the two US state capitals higher than Denver, the mile-high city
La Paz, the highest world capital, began a public transit system solely based on this means in 2014

clues.text: This Chinese city's name only dates back to 2001, when officials took the name from James Hilton's Lost Horizons to promote tourism

One of her side gigs outside of SNL was voicing Joy in Inside Out (2015)
She played Jackie Burkhart in That '70s Show, and also Meg Griffin on Family Guy
He is the voice of Homer Simpson but has also voiced 31 other characters, like Krusty the Clown
Creator, executive producer, and the voice behind Rick and Morty
This company spun out of a Bank of America program in 1976. It is now the 8th largest company in the US by market cap (May 2020), and larger than BoA
